Name: Cylinder amulet with name of Amenemhat II
Description: From a burial containing the valuables of an Egyptian of the late Middle Kingdom. The inscribed steatite cylinder amulet bears the name of king Amenemhat II with the epithet 'beloved of Sobek lord of Sumenu' (a sanctuary far to the south, in Upper Egypt); amulets with royal names are found in non-royal burials throughout Egypt.
